trans-unit.target: Directive: Destroy Corrupted Crystals<tab>A mass of enormous corrupted crystals has been detected near the Scream Puff. Pilot a vacuum suit, destroy the crystals, and gather the remnants for processing and repurposing.<tab>Destroy large corrupted crystals.<tab>Destroy small corrupted crystals and submit the remnants to the field scanners.<tab>The mech op directive “Destroy Corrupted Crystals” has been issued. Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.<tab>Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.

Directive: Clear Toxic Lunar Spongoi<tab>A bed of toxic spongoi has sprouted near the Mush-room. Needless to say, the proliferation of these spongoi and their spores would greatly impede the exploration initiative. Pilot a warp loader and clear out the red spongoi.<tab>Clear out the toxic spongoi.<tab>Clear away smaller spongoi using flamethrowers, and submit their ashes to nearby field scanners.<tab>The mech op directive “Clear Toxic Lunar Spongoi” has been issued. Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.<tab>Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.

Directive: Mine Phainite<tab>The Saltpeter Shore is rich in phainite, a resource highly valued by the initiative. Pilot a vacuum suit, harness the necessary energy, and extract this volcanic glass from pits of quicksand.<tab>Mine phainite from quicksand pits. Ten units of ionic energy must be harnessed for extraction.<tab>Drill for shallow reserves of phainite, and submit samples to nearby field scanners.<tab>The mech op directive “Mine Phainite” has been issued. Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.<tab>Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.

Directive: Shatter Glass Clusters<tab>Fluctuations in the Chillmark's ground temperature have enabled the proliferation of remarkably high-purity glass clusters─a vital asset for crafting lenses and machinery. Pilot the warp loader, shatter the clusters, and collect the larger fragments that remain.<tab>Shatter glass clusters.<tab>Salvage glass fragments, and submit them to nearby field scanners.<tab>The mech op directive “Shatter Glass Clusters” has been issued. Pilot candidates, please apply for deployment via your exotablets.<tab>Mechs will be deployed shortly. Supporting personnel, please report to the directive's designated location.
